segments.text: How can I get my driver's license ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you taken your driving test yet ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have yet to take my driving test .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , first I'm going to need you to fill out the paperwork .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When can I take my test ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You'll have to make an appointment for that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would like to make one right now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What time would you like to take the test ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If I could do it in the morning , then that would be good .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Eleven o'clock on Friday morning . See you then .
segments.speaker: S2
